title: The Manual: 8 best men's autumn fragrances and skincare products to buy now, according to The Telegraph's grooming expert
text:
On the hunt for a new men's grooming essential? Every fortnight, our grooming expert, Lee Kynaston, will be rounding up the best products that have earned his seal of approval.

From leathery autumnal fragrances to skincare products that put the fun back into grooming, these are the 8 products to invest in now.

Good-clean-fun skincare

One of the main reasons men don’t bother with skincare is because, let’s face it, it’s not much fun. I mean, who gets excited about exfoliation or emotional at the sight of an eye cream? It doesn’t have to be that way, though.

There are plenty of products out there – from self-heating razors and brightly coloured face masks to skin-peeling socks (if you think...
description: On the hunt for a new men's grooming essential?
